## Read fitness data

```{r fitness.data}

### SEED SET
seedset_1 <- read.csv("Data/Fitness/individual_seed_set_Roff_Clib_Hhal_Lped_Tmas.csv", sep=";")
seedset_2 <- read.csv("Data/Fitness/individual_seed_set_G_Sgen_Csal_Hcom.csv", sep=";")
glimpse(seedset_1)

#seedset_1 <- (seedset_1[, 1:7])
#seedset_1 <- seedset_1[!is.na(seedset_1$N_seeds),]
#seedset_1[seedset_1 == ''] <- NA
seedset_1 %<>% select(1:7) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(N_seeds)) %>% 
  mutate_if(is.character, list(~na_if(.,""))) %>% 
  tidyr::fill(c("ID", "Plot", "Plant_sp", "Plant_sp_complete", "Plant_id"), .direction = 'down')

seedset_2 %<>% select(1:7) %>% 
  filter(!is.na(N_seeds)) %>% 
  mutate_if(is.character, list(~na_if(.,""))) %>% 
  tidyr::fill(c("ID", "Plot", "Plant_sp", "Plant_sp_complete", "Plant_id"), .direction = 'down')


seedset <- rbind(seedset_1, seedset_2) %>%
  mutate(N_seeds = as.numeric(N_seeds))
str(seedset)


seedset %<>% select(Plot, Plant_sp, Plant_id, N_fruit, N_seeds) %>%
  group_by(Plot, Plant_sp, Plant_id) %>%
  dplyr::summarize(Mean_N_seeds = mean(N_seeds, na.rm=T)) 

str(seedset)

hist(filter(seedset, Plant_sp == "CLIB")$Mean_N_seeds)
hist(filter(seedset, Plant_sp == "HCOM")$Mean_N_seeds)
hist(filter(seedset, Plant_sp == "HHAL")$Mean_N_seeds)

hist(filter(seedset, Plant_sp == "ROFF")$Mean_N_seeds)

# AVEL, HPIC


### FRUIT SET

fruitset <- read.csv("Data/Fitness/individual_fruit_set_all.csv", sep=";")

fruitset <- fruitset %>% select(Plot, Plant_sp, Plant_id, Branch_inflorescence_id,
                                  Flowers_produced, Fruits_produced) %>% 
  mutate(Fruit_set= Fruits_produced/Flowers_produced) %>% 
  na.omit() %>%
  group_by(Plot, Plant_sp, Plant_id) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(Mean_fruit_set = mean(Fruit_set))

fruitset_AVEL <- read.csv("Data/Fitness/fruit_set_inflorescences_Avel.csv", sep=";")
fruitset_AVEL %<>% filter(Plant_sp =="AVEL") %>% 
  mutate(Fruit_set= Seeds_produced/Flowers_produced) %>%
  group_by(Plot, Plant_sp, Plant_id) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(Mean_fruit_set = mean(Fruit_set))

fruitset %<>% rbind(fruitset_AVEL)


## overall fitness

fitness <- full_join(seedset, fruitset, by=c("Plant_id", "Plot", "Plant_sp")) 

fitness %<>% full_join(select(plant.traits, Plant_id, N_flowers), by="Plant_id") %>% 
  mutate(Mean_N_seeds= ifelse(Plant_sp=="AVEL", Mean_fruit_set, Mean_N_seeds),
         N_seeds_plant= ifelse(Plant_sp=="AVEL", N_flowers*Mean_fruit_set, N_flowers*Mean_fruit_set*Mean_N_seeds)) %>% na.omit %>% 
  group_by(Plant_sp) %>% 
  mutate(N_seeds_sc = range01(N_seeds_plant), Mean_N_seeds_sc = range01(Mean_N_seeds),
         N_flowers_sc=range01(N_flowers)) # AVEL number of seeds=number of fruits


```

# Fitness ~ weighted + binary model output

```{r}

w.pred.all <- rbind(sim.A.summ.wide, sim.B.summ.wide, sim.C.summ.wide, 
                    sim.D.summ.wide, sim.E.summ.wide, sim.F.summ.wide)
b.pred.all <- rbind(A.summ.wide, B.summ.wide, C.summ.wide, 
                    D.summ.wide, E.summ.wide, F.summ.wide)


w.pred.all %<>% mutate(method="weighted")
b.pred.all %<>% mutate(method="binary")

pred.all <- rbind(b.pred.all, w.pred.all) %>% pivot_wider(names_from = method, values_from = c(con,het))

# AVEL
seeds1 <- filter(pred.all, N_seeds_sc>0 & Plant_sp=="AVEL")
lm.all.seeds1 <- lm(log(N_seeds_sc) ~ scale(con_binary) + scale(het_binary) +
                          scale(con_weighted) + scale(het_weighted) + scale(n_int),
                        seeds1)
summary(lm.all.seeds1)
simulationOutput <- simulateResiduals(fittedModel = lm.all.seeds1)
plot(simulationOutput)
```

```{r}
   mutate(sum = rowSums(across(where(is.numeric)))) %>%
  mutate_if(is.numeric, ~round(., 2)) %>%
  mutate(`scale(con_binary)`=`scale(con_binary)`/sum,
                                                               `scale(het_binary)`=`scale(het_binary)`/sum,
                                                               `scale(con_weighted)`=`scale(con_weighted)`/sum,
                                                               `scale(het_weighted)`=`scale(het_weighted)`/sum)

rel.impo %<>% mutate_if(is.numeric, ~round(., 2))
rel.impo %<>% mutate(Plant_sp=c("AVEL", "CLIB", "HCOM", "HHAL", "LPED", "ROFF", "SGEN", "TMAS"))
colMeans(rel.impo[sapply(rel.impo, is.numeric)])

sapply(dplyr::select(rel.impo, -Plant_sp), sd)



# for presentation

ggplot(filter(lm.all, method=="weighted" & Plant_sp=="TMAS")) + 
  geom_pointrange(mapping=aes(x=Estimate, y=variable, xmin=Estimate-se, xmax=Estimate+se), color="grey50",
                  size=0.7) + geom_vline(xintercept =0, linetype="dashed", 
                color = "grey50", size=0.6) + theme_base() + theme(
   plot.background = element_blank(), 
   strip.text.x = element_text(face = "italic", size=8),
   strip.text.y = element_text(face = "bold", size=8),
   axis.text.x = element_text(size=12, margin = margin(t = 5, r = 0, b = 0, l = 0)),
   axis.text.y = element_text(size=12, margin = margin(t = 0, r = 5, b = 0, l = 0)),
   legend.position = "none") +
   scale_y_discrete(breaks=c("scale(con_weighted)", "scale(het_weighted)"),
        labels=c("Conspecific",
                          "Heterospecific")) + 
  ylab("Pollinator sharing probability")
```
